entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, Prince George
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:45 a.m. PDT Wednesday 3 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, 19.3Â°C

Observed at: Prince George Airport 8:00 PM PDT Wednesday 3 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm late this evening and overnight. Low 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 3 May 2023
